application.name: http2midi
application.description:
This Website is to help test and debug the http2midi application. The Webserver itself is for sending Commands from a Streamdeck running Companion. Afterward, it sends Midi Commands to Studio One, the Audio recording software, or Presenter, the well .... presentation software ;).

If there are any questions about functionality or problems, please let me know.
application.author: Josia Scheerle
